amendment.description: To create a point of order against legislation that would allow for six-figure tax cuts for the top 1/10th of 1 percent of taxpayers.

action.text: Amendment SA 91 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 91 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 51. Record Vote Number: 29.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 305(b)(2) of the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 91.

Amendment SA 91 proposed by Senator Grassley. (consideration: CR S443; text: CR S443) To create a point of order against legislation that would allow for six-figure tax cuts for the top 1/10th of 1 percent of taxpayers.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 91 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 51. Record Vote Number: 29.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 91 proposed by Senator Grassley.
